alert.note: Alert for Bennington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 12:13PM EST until December 19 at 9:34AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Walloomsac River at Bennington. * WHEN...From this afternoon to late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, water is almost to road level. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 7.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 10.6 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Walloomsac River Bennington Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Mon 11 am: 7.3 Forecast: Mon 1 pm 8.6 Mon 7 pm 10.6 Tue 1 am 7.9 Tue 7 am 5.8 Tue 1 pm 4.6 Tue 7 pm 3.8 Wed 1 am 3.5 Wed 7 am 3.3 Wed 1 pm 3.1 Wed 7 pm 3.0 Thu 1 am 2.9 Thu 7 am 2.9 &&
